column4: help guys I am lost now....fresh install ubuntu 12.04, installation finishes successfully, however after reboot system cannot boot i.e like there is no grub or bootloader....I installed twice now
Did you try booting from the LiveCD and choosing the boot from hard drive option?  If that works you can have it reinstall the bootloader
when i insert live cd the only options are try install, I also get this missing prefix error before grub boots
